channel.title: Problem
channel.description:
A friend of mine playing on my server got his Magic stats drained to 0 so now it's like 0/99 I don't know how to fix that because when i go into the character file and edit his stats nothing changes.
Also where can i put the max exp you can get for a skill?

item.title: Problem
item.dc:creator: @Dragonpurse Dragonpurse
item.description:
@Dragonpurse wrote:

Yea how do i prevent this from happening again? aka where can I change the maximum exp you can get for a skill?

Read full topic
